n: Simple Syrup with TruviaÂ® Natural Sweetener
des: "Simple syrup sweetened with TruviaÂ® natural sweetener will provide a savings of 100 calories or 26 grams of sugar per serving compared to the sugar-sweetened version."
ins:
Add Truvia(R) natural sweetener to 1/2 cup of warm water.
Shake or blend until dissolved completely.
Store refrigerated. For best results, use within a day of making.
